name: Unique handmade felt pick and mix set
description:
Hello and welcome to Gillybeans!

This listing is for a beautiful handmade felt pick and mix bag which contains :-

1 felt Banana
1 felt flying saucer
1 felt chocolate jazzie
1 felt jelly bean
1 felt giant strawberry
1 felt cola bottle

The pick and mix bag is made from cream felt and is machine stitched and decorated with pink stripes. All the felt sweets are handmade and hand embroidered to a very high standard. Each item is padded with toy stuffing.

As well as been a textile designer I run a traditional sweet shop which has inspired me to make this item, Kids and big kids love pick and mix so what could be better than pick and mix with out the calories!

They look fantastic so can even be kept as an ornament or talking point, they are also great for kids role playing.

If the pick and mix doesn't include your favorite sweet why not get in touch and order your very own customised pick and mix.

With Christmas just around the corner this would be a great original gift for someone special.

Thanks for looking!

name: Mitten Christmas tree decoration
description:
Hello and welcome to Gillybeans!

These cute winter mittens will look beautiful hung on your Christmas tree or displayed around your home this Christmas.

They are made from red and white felt and are hand embroidered using running stitch, cross stitch and gold tread.

Each mitten measures 9cm tall and 4cm wide.

I can make mittens in a variety of colours so please get in touch

Thank you for looking!

name: Handmade Russian doll Christmas tree decoration
description:
Hello and welcome to Gillybeans!

This cute Russian doll will look beautiful hung on your Christmas tree or displayed around your home this Christmas.

She is made from red felt and festive green fabric, she is embellished with gold sequins and gold thread to make her even more special. Each doll is lovingly handmade so each one has slightly different facial features.

She measures 8cm tall (head to toe) and 4.5cm wide.

All Russian dolls are made to order so if you would like a different hair colour or fabric colour please get in touch.

Thank you for looking!

name: Handmade snowman Christmas tree decoration
description:
Hello and welcome to Gillybeans!

This cute snowman will look beautiful hung on your Christmas tree or displayed around your home this Christmas.

He is made from white felt and decorated with a blue scarf and black felt hat, he has french knots for eyes and his mouth and an embroidered orange nose.

He measures 11cm tall and 6cm wide so he will stand out on your Christmas tree

If you would like your snowman with different colour accessories please get in touch

Thank you for looking!

name: Handmade Father Christmas tree decoration
description:
Hello and welcome to Gillybeans!

This jolly Father Christmas decoration will look beautiful hung on your Christmas tree or displayed around your home this Christmas.

He is made from red, white and cream felt and is hand embroidered, to give him the chubby Father Christmas feel he is filled with toy stuffing.

This Father Christmas is sure to stand out on your tree, he measures 14cm tall (hat to beard) and 6cm wide.

It is the details that make this decoration so special the pom pom on his hat and the red silk ribbon that he hangs on.

Thank you for looking!
